mapper.insert: insert into tbl_customer( id, owner, name, website, phone, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, contactSummary, nextContactTime, description, address )values( #{id}, #{owner}, #{name}, #{website}, #{phone}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{editBy}, #{editTime}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}, #{description}, #{address} )
mapper.select: select name from tbl_customer where name like '%' #{name} '%'
